name: SUVREY
description:
A first attempt at a VR experience, for RMIT Game-a-Week 2022
Built for Oculus Quest


A VR customer survey where your words aren't heard by anyone.

Uses a lot of the Oculus VR resource package for Unity:
https://developer.oculus.com/documentation/unity/unity-gs-overview/

Uses Twemoji:
https://twemoji.twitter.com/
